```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
x <- read_csv("train.csv",
              col_types = cols(
                            treatment = col_double(),
                            att_start = col_double(),
                            att_end = col_double(),
                            att_chg = col_double(),
                            income = col_double(),
                            liberal = col_double(),
                            republican = col_double(),
                            age = col_double(),
                            male = col_double(),
                            treatment.2 = col_character()
                          ))

x %>% 
  ggplot(aes(republican, att_start)) + 
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") + 
  geom_jitter(width = 0.1)
```
